_header: O thou Lucina queen and emperess
Title(s): ‘Balade made by Lydgate at þe Departyng of Thomas Chaucyer on Ambassade into France’
_description: ohn Lydgate, ‘Balade made by Lydgate at þe Departyng of Thomas Chaucyer on Ambassade into France’ [A.D. 1414] — eleven stanzas rhyme royal

BLAdd16165.First Lines:
O þow lucyna qwene and empyresseOf waters alle and of floodes
                    rage…
BLAdd16165.Last Lines:
…Daye and night with hert debonayreAnd prey to god þat he
                    soone may repayre
BLAdd16165.Attributed Title:
Balade made by Lydegate at þe departyng of Thomas Chaucyer on
                    Ambassade in to ffrance. By Lidegate (f. 248)
